contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox automobile |name=ZIL-135 |image=Luna m frog 7 hameenlinna 1.jpg |caption= An East German ZIL-135 equipped with a FROG-7 missile |manufacturer={{ubl|[[ZiL|Zavod Imeni Likhacheva]]|[[Bryansky Avtomobilny Zavod]]}} |production=1959-1994? |class= |layout= |engine={{ubl|''ZIL-123F'' x2 (prototype)|6.9L ''ZIL-375YA'' V8 x2}} |transmission= {{ubl|6-speed automatic, x2|5-speed manual, x2 (ZIL-135LM)}} |length={{convert|9260|mm|in|1|abbr=on}} |width={{convert|3130|mm|in|1|abbr=on}} |height={{convert|3060|mm|in|1|abbr=on}} |weight={{convert|7000|kg|lb|0|abbr=on}} }} The '''[[Zavod Imeni Likhacheva|ZIL]]-135''' is a large, 8 wheeled military transport and self-propelled artillery truck produced in the [[Cold War]] by the [[Soviet Union]] starting in 1959. Its purpose was to carry and launch an artillery [[missile]], specifically a [[FROG-7]], from [[Surface-to-surface missile|surface-to-surface]]. The ZIL-135 was widely exported to other communist countries, most notably [[North Korea]], where it is a common sight in films and military marches. ==Modifications== *ZIL-135: launcher for FROG-7 (Luna-M) missile (1959) *ZIL-135B: amphibious version of ZIL-135 (1959) *ZIL-135E: non-amphibious version of ZIL-135B (1960) *ZIL-135E: diesel-electric hybrid (1965) *ZIL-135K: launcher for C-5 missile (1961) *ZIL-135KM: launcher for P-35 missile (1962, prototype for BAZ) *ZIL-135KP: land train (1969) *ZIL-135L: improved suspension (1961) *ZIL-135LM: ZIL-135L with manual transmission (1964) *ZIL-135LN: chassis-cab based on ZIL-135K *ZIL-135P: amphibious landing transport (landing barge) (1965) *ZIL-135SH: zero-turn radius (1967) ==Specifications== * Length: {{convert|30.41|ft|m|abbr=on}} * Width: {{convert|9.19|ft|m|abbr=on}} * Height: {{convert|8.30|ft|m|abbr=on}} * GVW (without missile): 11.57 tons * Ground clearance: {{convert|580|mm|in|abbr=on}} * Pitch angle: 57Â° * Engine: 2 X ZIL-375YA V-8 6.9 liter gas engines * Horsepower: {{convert|180|hp|abbr=on}} X 2 * Top speed: {{convert|40.39|mi/h|km/h|2|abbr=on}} * Range: {{convert|248.55|mi|km|abbr=on}} * Fuel consumption: 1-3mpg <!-- US or imp?? --> [[Category:Wheeled self-propelled rocket launchers]] [[Category:ZiL]] [[Category:Military vehicles of the Soviet Union]] {{mil-vehicle-stub}} {{Russia-mil-stub}}
